The qsurvey package: overview

qsurvey is a toolkit for working with the Qualtrics survey platform and its data in R. It focuses on testing and review of surveys before fielding, and analysis of responses afterward.

Details

  • Examine branching, randomization, and question attributes
  • Represent survey flows as directed graphs for plotting or interactive review in Shiny
  • Download and manipulate response data

For more see the http://jdunham.io/qsurvey.

A https://www.qualtrics.com/support/integrations/api-integration/api-integration is needed to communicate with the survey platform. Set the environment variable QUALTRICS_KEY to your key value. You can do this during R startup (recommended), interactively with Sys.setenv, or through key_from_file.

Developed by James Dunham.
